title: Hamburgers, Homicide and a Honeymoon
description: What happens when small-town murder meets a big-hearted caf√© owner? When a belated honeymoon to London intertwines with an international tattoo awards ceremony, things takes a horrific turn when a celebration with new friends abruptly ends with the untimely death of one of the guests. Twists, turns, and red herrings are around every corner as the investigation into the death gathers pace and, as Charlotte and Nathan look forward to the birth of their first child back in St. Eves, the race is on to find a killer before the arrival of baby Costello. Charlotte and the rest of the St Eves gang are back in this mystery, set in St. Eves and London. A light, clean, fun, cozy mystery, with characters who'll stay with you long after you've finished reading, and recipes to try for yourself. You won't find any gore, graphic language, violence, sex, or cliffhangers in this book, but you will find a very happy ending! This book is written in British English and contains UK terminology and spelling.
author: Sherri Bryan
